text:
Mars is a large
multinational corporation, but

we focus on confections,
chocolate, gum, and mints,

pet care and pet food,
as well as food.
Greenies is an important

brand for us
and this was a great new launch

that we really wanted
to have a great campaign with.

And AWS came to us
leveraging Amazon Bedrock

with a really interesting,
engaging idea that allowed us
to amplify our campaign both
in terms of

making it engaging
and fun for consumers,

but also allowing us to place
great content in really,

really relevant and important
places, like Amazon and like

the comments area, so consumers
can really read, engage,

and make something fun
that usually is just shopping.

Leveraging AWS,
we created the worldâ€™s
first Dog Interpreter

where you could create a parody
review just by using your camera,

recording them
and getting their reaction,

and turn that into a brand review
for Amazon.

What we loved about
the AWS team is that

we came to them with the problem
and they found solutions

and they found ideas
that really transcend technology

and turn it into functional usage
for our consumers,

really making it
fun and engaging,

and really getting at the heart
of bringing kind of humanity

but also reactions from 
our pets and animals

so that connection between
humans and their pets

and pet parents
and their pets.
